name: Cosmic Gatlin'
description:
WELCOME TO 

Are you ready to survive on the space? Become the sheriff and start killing robots, drones and other type of enemies with your rainbow gun. 

▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬ஜ۩۞۩ஜ▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬

 Description 

In Cosmic Gatlin', your purpose is to survive as long as you can. The more you stay the more score you will achieve and new types of enemies and power-ups you will discover. Also you can get more score by killing enemies with your rainbow gun.

 How to play 

These are the controls of our game :

  • Q: Go up (Jump)  
  • A: Go down (Fall)  
  • P: Shoot rainbows 

 There are two types of power up:

     x2 (Double score)

 Gatlin' (Increased rate of fire)  

And there are also two types of enemies:

Basic enemies:

          

Special enemies:

 Gesture 

Our gesture to the Rainbow Islands game is shown on the main mechanic of the game, shooting. The sheriff literally shoots rainbows. 

 Install Instructions 

WinAPE: 

If you already installed the last version of WinAPE and downloaded the .sna of the game, it is a very simple task: 

1. Execute WinAPE. 

2. Load the snapshot: ○ Press F5 and select the snapshot. ○ Or go to File > Load Snapshot > Select the snapshot. 

3. Enjoy the game. 😎 

Amstrad CPC 464:

1. Insert the cassette. 

2. Type RUN” and press ENTER. 

3. Press PLAY at the cassette unit.

4. Press any key. 

5. Wait until the game has fully loaded.
